articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Russia has secret war drones project in China, intel sources say in Reuters report - CNBC
articles.description: Russia has weapons program in China to manufacture long-range attack drones for the Ukraine war, according to European intelligence as reviewed by Reuters.
articles.content:
Flags of the People's Republic of China and the Russian Federation
Russia has established a weapons program in China to develop and produce long-range attack drones for use in the war against Ukrain… [+8701 chars]
